summary: A spelltome that conjures a centurion master
descriptionHtml:
A spelltome I made that you can summon a level 81 centurion master. I made him smaller to only taller than human size, probably 8ft tall. No perks or skill levels to summon him. It last for 60 seconds. No need to wait for magic bar to refill. Summon him immediately after he expires. Now with his size smaller, he could follow you into dungeons and caves. Though smaller in size but still packs the same strength and ability.

Go to Riverwood traders, it\'s on a small table by the corner in level 2.
author: simplesim
